divy21:7: buddho bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe |
divy21:8: ācaritamāyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya kālena kālaṁ narakacārikāṁ carituṁ tiryakcārikāṁ carituṁ pretacārikāṁ devacārikāṁ manuṣyacārikāṁ caritum |
divy21:9: sa yāni tāni nārakāṇāṁ sattvānāmutpāṭānupāṭanacchedanabhedanādīni duḥkhāni, tiraścāmanyonyabhakṣaṇādīni, pretānāṁ kṣuttṛṣādīni, devānāṁ cyavanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṁsanādīni, manuṣyāṇāṁ paryeṣṭicyasanādīni duḥkhāni, tāni dṛṣṭvā jambudvīpamāgatya catasṛṇāṁ parṣadāmārocayati |
divy21:10: yasya kasyacit sārdhaṁvihārī antevāsī vā anabhirato brahmacaryaṁ carati, sa tamādāya yenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanastenopasaṁkrāmati, āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyana enaṁ samyagavavadiṣyati, anuśāsiṣyatīti |
divy21:12: evamaparamaparaṁ te āyuṣmatā mahāmaudgalyāyanena samyagavavāditāḥ samyaganuśiṣṭā abhiratā brahmacaryaṁ caranti, uttare ca viśeṣamadhigacchanti |
divy21:13: tena khalu samayenāuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaścatasṛbhiḥ parṣadbhirākīrṇo viharati bhikṣubhirbhikṣuṇībhirupāsakairupāsikābhiśca |
divy21:16: sa kathayati—ācaritaṁ bhadanta āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya kālena kālaṁ narakacārikāṁ carituṁ tiryakcarikāṁ pretacārikāṁ devacārikāṁ manuṣyacārikāṁ caritum |
divy21:17: sa yāni tāni nārakāṇāṁ sattvānāmutpāṭānupāṭanacchedanabhedanādīni duḥkhāni, tiryaścāmanyonyabhakṣaṇādīni, pretānāṁ kṣuttṛṣādīni, devānāṁ cyavanapatanavikiraṇavidhvaṁsanādīni, manuṣyāṇāṁ paryeṣṭivyasanādīni duḥkhāni, tāni dṛṣṭvā jambudvīpamāgatya catasṛṇāṁ parṣadāmārocayati |
divy21:18: yasya kasyacit sārdhaṁvihārī antevāsī vā anabhirato brahmacaryaṁ carati, sa tamādāya yenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanastenopasaṁkrāmati, āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyana eva samyagavavadiṣyati samyaganuśāsiṣyatīti, tamāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ samyagavavadati samyaganuśāsti |
divy21:19: evamaparamaparaṁ te āyuṣmatā mahāmaudgalyāyanena samyagavavāditāḥ samyagavuśiṣṭā abhiratā brahmacaryaṁ caranti, uttare ca viśeṣamadhigacchanti |
divy21:20: ayaṁ bhadanta heturayaṁ pratyayo yenāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaścatasṛbhiḥ parṣadbhirākīrṇo viharati bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikābhiḥ |
divy21:21: na sarvatra ānanda maudgalyāyano bhikṣurbhaviṣyati maudgalyāyanasadṛśo vā |
divy21:23: uktaṁ bhagavatā dvārakoṣṭhake pañcagaṇḍakaṁ cakraṁ kārayitavyamiti |
divy21:25: bhagavānāha—pañca gatayaḥ kartavyā narakāstiryañcaḥ pretā devā manuṣyāśca |
divy21:26: tatrādhastāt narakāḥ kartavyāḥ, tiryañcaḥ pretāśca, upariṣṭāt devā manuṣyāśca |
divy21:28: madhye rāgadveṣamohāḥ kartavyāḥ, rāgaḥ pārāvatākāreṇa, dveṣo bhujaṅgākāreṇa, mohaḥ sūkarākāreṇa |
divy21:30: anupapādukāḥ sattvā ghaṭīyantraprayogeṇa cyavamānā upapadyamānāśca kartavyāḥ |
divy21:32: sarvamanityatayā grastaṁ kartavyam, gāthādvayaṁ ca lekhayitavyam— ārabhadhvaṁ niṣkrāmata yujyadhvaṁ buddhaśāsane |
divy21:37: uktaṁ bhagavatā dvārakoṣṭhake pañcagaṇḍakaṁ cakraṁ kārayitavyamiti bhikṣubhiḥ kāritam |
divy21:38: brāhmaṇagṛhapataya āgatya pṛcchanti—ārya, kimidaṁ likhitamiti? te kathayanti—bhadramukhāḥ, vayamapi na jānīma iti |
divy21:39: bhagavānāha—dvārakoṣṭhake bhikṣuruddeṣṭavyo ya āgatāgatānāṁ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāṁ darśayati |
divy21:41: te aviśeṣeṇoddiśanti bālānapi mūḍhānapi avyaktānapi akuśalānapi |
divy21:42: te ātmanā na jānate, kutaḥ punarāgatānāṁ brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnāṁ darśayiṣyanti? bhagavānāha—pratibalo bhikṣuruddeṣṭavya iti |
divy21:46: sa tayā sārdhaṁ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
divy21:47: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ |
divy21:48: tasya trīṇi saptakānyekaviṁśatidivasān vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṁ kṛtvā kulasadṛśaṁ nāmadheyaṁ vyavasthāpitam |
divy21:52: sa suhṛtsambandhibāndhavānāmantrayitvā antarjanaṁ ca samāśvāsya mahāsamudragamanīyaṁ paṇyamādāya divasatithimuhūrtena mahāsamudramavatīrṇaḥ |
divy21:54: tasya patnyā sa dārako jñātibalena hastabalena pālitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṁvardhito lipyāmupanyasto lipyakṣareṣu ca kṛtāvī saṁvṛttaḥ |
divy21:55: sa vayaskareṇa sārdhaṁ veṇuvanaṁ gato vihāraṁ praviṣṭaḥ paśyati dvārakoṣṭhake pañcagaṇḍakaṁ cakramabhilikhitam |
divy21:56: sa pṛcchati—ārya, kimidamabhilikhitamiti? bhikṣuḥ kathayati—bhadramukha, etāḥ pañca gatayo narakāstiryañcaḥ pretā devā manuṣyāśca |
divy21:57: ārya, kimebhiḥ karma kṛtam yenaivaṁvidhāni duḥkhāni praryanubhavantīti? sa kathayati—ete prāṇātipātikā adattādāyikāḥ kāmamithyācārikā mṛṣāvādikāḥ paiśunikāḥ pāruṣikāḥ saṁbhinnapralāpikā abhidhyālavo vyāpannacittā mithyādṛṣṭikāḥ |
divy21:58: tadebhirete daśākuśalāḥ karmapathā atyarthamāsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtāḥ, yena evaṁvidhāni duḥkhānyutpāṭānupāṭacchedanabhedanādīni pratyanubhavanti |
divy21:60: ebhiranyaiḥ kiṁ karma kṛtam yena evaṁvidhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti? duḥkhānyanyonyabhakṣaṇādīni pratyanubhavanti |
divy21:62: ebhiranyaiḥ kiṁ karma kṛtam yena evaṁvidhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti? bhadramukha, ete ’pi matsariṇa āsan kuṭukuñcakā āgṛhītapariṣkārāḥ |
divy21:63: tattena mātsaryeṇāsevitena bhāvitena bahulīkṛtena evaṁvidhāni duḥkhāni kṣuttṛṣādīni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti |
divy21:65: ebhiranyaiḥ kiṁ karma kṛtam yena evaṁvidhāni sukhāni pratyanubhavanti? bhadramukha, ete prāṇātipātāt prativiratā adattādānāt kāmamithyācārānmṛṣāvādāt paiśunyāt pāruṣyāt saṁbhinnapralāpādanabhidhyāpannacittāḥ samyagdṛṣṭayaḥ |
divy21:66: tadebhirete daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā atyarthamāsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtāḥ, yena evaṁvidhāni divyastrīlalitavimānodyānasukhāni pratyanubhavanti |
divy21:68: ebhiranyaiḥ kiṁ karma kṛtam yena sukhāni pratyanubhavanti? bhadramukha, ebhirapi daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathāstanutarā mṛdutarāścāsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtāḥ, yena evaṁvidhāni hastyaśvarathānnapānaśayanāsanastrīlalitodyānasukhāni pratyanubhavanti |
divy21:69: ārya, āsāṁ pañcānāṁ gatīnām yā etāstisro gatayo narakāstiryañcaḥ pretāśca, etā mahyaṁ na rocante |
divy21:70: ye tu ete devā manuṣyāśca ete rocete |
divy21:71: tatkathamete daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ samādāya vartayitavyāh? bhadramukha, svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajya saced dṛṣṭa eva dharme ājñāmārāgayiṣyasi, eṣa eva te ’nto duḥkhasya |
divy21:73: uktaṁ hi bhagavatā—pañcānuśaṁsān samanupaśyatā piṇḍatenālameva pravrajyādhimuktena bhavitum |
divy21:74: katamāni pañca? āveṇikā ime svārthā anuprāpto bhaviṣyāmīti saṁpaśyatā piṇḍatenālameva pravrajyādhimuktena bhavitum |
divy21:75: yeṣāmahaṁ dāsaḥ preṣyo nirdeśyo bhujiṣyo nayena kāmaṁgamaḥ, teṣāṁ pūjyaśca bhaviṣyāmi praśaṁsyaśceti saṁpaśyatā piṇḍatena alameva pravrajyādhimuktena bhavitum |
divy21:76: anuttaram yogakṣemaṁ nirvāṇamanuprāpsyāmīti saṁpaśyatā piṇḍatena alameva pravrajyādhimuktena bhavitum |
divy21:77: anuttaraṁ vā yogakṣemaṁ nirvāṇamanuprāpnuvato ’nāpattikasya sato deeveṣūpapattirbhaviṣyatīti saṁpaśyatā piṇḍatena alameva pravrajyādhimuktena bhavitum |
divy21:80: kiṁ tatra pravrajyāyāṁ kriyate? bhadramukha, yāvajjīvaṁ brahmacaryaṁ caryate |
divy21:82: anyo ’sti upāyah? bhadramukha, asti, upāsako bhava |
divy21:83: ārya, kiṁ tatra kriyate? bhadraṁkha, yāvajjīvaṁ prāṇātipātāt prativiratiḥ saṁrakṣyā, adattādānāt kāmamithyācārāt surāmaireyamadyapramādasthānāt prativiratiḥ saṁrakṣyā |
divy21:87: ārya, kiyadbhiḥ kārṣāpaṇairbuddhapramukho bhikṣusaṁgho bhojyate? bhadramukha, pañcabhiḥ kārṣāpaṇaśataiḥ |
divy21:92: tatra mayā dvārakoṣṭhake pañcagaṇḍakaṁ cakramabhilikhitaṁ dṛṣṭam |
divy21:93: tatra pañca gatayo narakāstiryañcaḥ pretā devā manuṣyāśca |
divy21:99: āsāṁ mama tisro gatayo nābhipretāḥ, dve abhiprete |
divy21:100: tatkimicchasi tvaṁ māṁ deveṣūpapadyamānam? putra, sarvasattvānicchāmi deveṣūpapadyamānān prāgeva tvām |
divy21:103: putra, mayā tvaṁ jñātibalena hastabalena cāpyāyitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṁvardhitaḥ |
divy21:104: kuto me pañcānāṁ kārṣāpaṇaśatānāṁ vibhavah? amba, yadi nāsti, bhṛtikayā karma karomi |
divy21:109: sa tayā anujñāto bhṛtakavīthīṁ gatvā avasthitaḥ |
divy21:110: brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo ’nyān bhṛtakapuruṣān gṛhṇanti, taṁ na kaścit pṛcchati |
divy21:111: sa tatra divasamatināmya vikāle gṛhaṁ gataḥ |
divy21:112: sa mātrā pṛṣṭah—putra, kṛtaṁ te bhṛtikayā karma? amba, kiṁ karomi? na māṁ kaścit pṛcchati |
divy21:115: yadyavaśyaṁ tvayā bhṛtikayā karma kartavyam, īdṛśaṁ veṣamāsthāya bhṛtakavīthīṁ gatvā tiṣṭha |
divy21:118: so ’parasmin divase tādṛśaṁ veṣamāsthāya bhṛtakavīthīṁ gatvā avasthitaḥ |
divy21:121: tena taṁ pratyākhyāya anye bhṛtakapuruṣā gṛhītāḥ |
divy21:122: sa kathayati—gṛhapate, ahamapi bhṛtikayā karma karomīti |
divy21:123: gṛhapatiḥ kathayati—putra, tvaṁ sukumāraḥ, na śakṣyasi bhṛtikayā karma kartum |
divy21:124: tāt, kiṁ tvaṁ pūrvaṁ bhṛtiṁ dadāsi, āhosvit paścāt? |
divy21:128: adya tāvat jijñāsyāmi yadi śakṣyati karma kartum, dāsyāmi |
divy21:129: na śakṣyati, na dāsyāmīti viditvā kathayati—putra āgaccha, gacchāma iti |
divy21:135: tadyadi śāṭhyena karma kariṣyāmaḥ, itaścyutānāṁ kā gatibhaviṣyati? te kathayanti—bhāgineya, tvaṁ navadāntaḥ |
divy21:139: teṁs teṣāṁ tādṛśī lokākhyānakathā prastutā, yāṁ śrutvā te bhṛtakapuruṣā ākṣiptāḥ |
divy21:140: tasyātisvareṇa gacchato ’nupadaṁ gacchanti, mā lokākhyāyikāṁ na śroṣyāma iti |
divy21:142: so ’dhiṣṭhāyakapuruṣaṁ pṛcchati—bhoḥ puruṣa, kiṁ tvayā apare bhṛtakā gṛhītāh? ārya, na gṛhītāḥ |
divy21:143: atha kasmādadya dviguṇaṁ karma kṛtam? tena yathāvṛttamārocitam |
divy21:144: śrutvā gṛhapatistasya dārakasya dviguṇāṁ bhṛtiṁ dātumārabdhaḥ |
divy21:145: sa kathayati—tāt, kiṁ dvidaivasikāṁ bhṛtiṁ dadāsīti? sa kathayati—putra, na dvidaivasikāṁ dadāmi, api tu prasanno ’haṁ prasannādhikāraṁ karomīti |
divy21:146: sa kathayati—tāt, yadi tvaṁ mamābhiprasannaḥ, yāvat tava gṛhe karma kartavyaṁ tāvat tavaiva haste tiṣṭhatu |
divy21:148: yadā tasya gṛhapatestadgṛhaṁ parisamāptam, tadā asau dārako bhṛtiṁ gaṇayitumārabdho yāvat pañca kārṣāpaṇaśatāni na paripūryante |
divy21:150: sa gṛhapatiḥ kathayati—putra, kiṁ rodiṣi? māsi mayā kiṁcit vyaṁsitaḥ |
divy21:151: tāt, mahātmā tvam, kiṁ māṁ vyaṁsayiṣyasi? api tu ahameva mandabhāgyaḥ |
divy21:152: mayā pañcānāṁ kārṣāpaṇaśatānāmarthāya bhṛtikayā karma prārabdhaṁ buddhapramukhaṁ bhikṣusaṁghaṁ bhojayiṣyāmi, tato deveṣūpapatsyāmīti |
divy21:154: punarapi mayā anyatra bhṛtikayā karma kartavyamiti |
divy21:158: putra, abhiśraddadhāsi tvaṁ bhagavatah? tāt abhiśraddadhe |
divy21:161: upasaṁkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ |
divy21:162: sa gṛhapatiputro bhagavantamidamavocat—bhagavan, mayā pañcānāṁ kārṣāpaṇaśatānāmarthāya bhagavantaṁ saśrāvakasaṁghaṁ bhojayiṣyāmītyamukasya gṛhapaterbhṛtikayā karma kṛtam |
divy21:165: bhagavan kim? āha—vatsa gṛhāṇa, śrāddhaḥ sa gṛhapatiḥ |
divy21:166: bhagavan, mā deveṣu nopapatsye? vatsa upapatsyase, gṛhāṇa |
divy21:167: sa parituṣṭo bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato ’ntikāt prakrānto yena sa gṛhapatistenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy21:168: upasaṁkramya gṛhapaterantikāt pañca kārṣāpaṇaśatāni gṛhītvā mātuḥ sakāśaṁ gataḥ |
divy21:172: sā kathayati—putra, na mama bhāṇḍopaskaro na śayanāsanam |
divy21:176: sa tasya sakāśaṁ gataḥ śiraḥpraṇāmaṁ kṛtvā kathayati—tvayaiva etāni pañca kārṣāpaṇaśatāni dattāani |
divy21:177: asmākaṁ gṛhe na bhāṇḍopaskaro nāpi śayanāsanam |
divy21:180: gṛhapatiḥ saṁlakṣayati—mamedaṁ gṛhamacirotthitaṁ buddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṁghena paribhuktaṁ bhaviṣyati, pratijāgarmi |
divy21:182: sthāpayitvā kārṣāpaṇān gaccha, śvo buddhapramukhaṁ bhikṣusaṁghamupanimantraya |
divy21:184: sa saṁjātasaumanasyaḥ śiraḥpraṇāmaṁ kṛtvā prakrānto yena bhagavāṁstenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy21:185: upasaṁkramya vṛddhānte sthitvā kathayati—so ’haṁ buddhapramukhaṁ bhikṣusaṁghamupanimantrayāmīti |
divy21:187: atha sa gṛhapatiputro bhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṁ viditvā bhagavato ’ntikāt prakrāntaḥ |
divy21:189: tenāpi gṛhapatinā tāmeva rātriṁ śuciṁ praṇītaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ samudānīya kālyamevotthāya gṛhaṁ saṁmārjitam |
divy21:190: sukumārī gomayakārṣī dattā, āsanaprajñaptiḥ kāritā, udakamaṇayaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ |
divy21:191: tenāpi gṛhapatiputreṇa gatvā bhagavata ārocitam—samayo bhadanta, sajjaṁ bhaktam yasyedānīṁ bhagavān kālaṁ manyate iti |
divy21:192: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṁghapuraskṛto yena tasya gṛhapater niveśanaṁ tenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy21:193: ṣaḍvargīyāḥ pṛcchanti—kenāayaṁ buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṁgha upanimantrita iti? apare kathayanti—amukena gṛhapatiputreṇeti |
divy21:194: te parasparaṁ saṁjalpaṁ kurvanti—nandopananda, bhṛtakapuruṣaḥ saḥ |
divy21:195: kimasau dāsyati? gacchāma kulopakagṛheṣu gatvā purobhaktakāṁ karma iti |
divy21:200: bhagavāṁstasya gṛhapater niveśane purastādbhikṣusaṁghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ |
divy21:201: ṣaḍvargīyā api purobhaktakāṁ kṛtvā saṁghamadhye niṣaṇṇaḥ |
divy21:202: atha sa gṛhapatipurtaḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṁ buddhapramukhaṁ bhikṣusaṁghaṁ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhijanīyena svahastaṁ saṁtarpayati saṁpravārayati |
divy21:203: satatapariveṣaṇaṁ kurvāṇaḥ paśyti ṣaḍvargīyān na satkṛtya parimuñjānān |
divy21:204: dṛṣṭvā ca punarbhagavantaṁ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṁ bhagavataḥ purastāt sthitvā kathayati—bhagavan, kaiścidatrāryakair na satkṛtya paribhuktamāhāram |
divy21:205: deveṣu nopapatsye iti? bhagavānāha—vatsa, śayanāsanaparibhogena tāvat tvaṁ deveṣūpapadyethāḥ prāgevānnapānaparibhogeneti |
divy21:206: atha bhagavāṁstaṁ gṛhapatiputraṁ ca dharmyayā kathayā saṁdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṁpraharṣyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ |
divy21:208: atrāntare pañcamātrāṇi vaṇikśatāni mahāsamudrāt saṁsiddhayānapātrāṇni rājagṛhamanuprāptāni |
divy21:209: rājagṛhe ca parva pratyupasthitamiti na kiṁcit krayeṇāpi labhyate |
divy21:211: sa kathayati—bhavantaḥ, āgamayata kasyādya gṛhe buddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṁghena bhaktam, tatrāvaśyaṁ kiṁcidutsadanadharmakaṁ bhavatīti |
divy21:213: kathayanti—gṛhapate, tavādya buddhapramukhena bhikṣusaṁghena bhukte iha parva pratyupasthitamiti na kiṁcit krayeṇāpi labhyate |
divy21:215: na mamaitadbhaktam, api tu tasyaitadgṛhapatiputrasya bhaktam |
divy21:217: te tasya sakāśamupasaṁkramya kathayanti—gṛhapatiputra, dīyatāmasmākaṁ bhuktaśeṣam yadasti |
divy21:221: te tenānnapānena saṁtarpitā gṛhapatergatvā kathayanti—tasya te gṛhapate lābhāḥ sulabdhā yasya te niveśane buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṁgho ’nnapānena saṁtarpitaḥ, imāni ca pañca vaṇikśatānīti |
divy21:223: anena buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṁgho ’nnapānena saṁtarpito na mayeti |
divy21:224: te pṛcchanti—katarasyāyaṁ gṛhapateḥ putrah? amukasya sārthavāhasya |
divy21:227: śakyaṁ bahubhirekaḥ samuddhartum, na tveva ekena bahavaḥ |
divy21:228: tadayaṁ paṭakaṁ prajñapto yena vo yat parityaktam, so ’smin paṭake ’nuprayacchatviti |
divy21:229: te pūrvamevābhiprasannāḥ sārthavāhena ca protsāhitā iti tairyathāsambhāvyena maṇimuktādīni ratnāni dattāni |
divy21:232: sa kathayati—tāt, na mayā mūlyena dattamiti |
divy21:233: sārthavāhaḥ kathayati—putra, na vayaṁ tava mūlyaṁ prayachāmaḥ |
divy21:234: yadi ca mūlyaṁ gaṇyate, ekena ratnenedṛśānāṁ bhaktānāmanekāni śatāni saṁvidyante |
divy21:235: kiṁ tu vayaṁ tavābhiprasannāḥ prasannādhikāraṁ kurmaḥ, gṛhāṇeti |
divy21:236: sa kathayati—tāt, mayā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṁgho bhojito deveṣūpapatsye iti |
divy21:238: yadi grahīṣyāmi, sthānametadvidyate yaddeveṣu nopapatsye? sārthavāhah—putra, abhiśraddadhāsi tvaṁ bhagavatah? tāt, abhiśraddadhe |
divy21:241: upasaṁkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ |
divy21:242: sa gṛhapatiputro bhagavantamidamavocat—bhagavan, mayā buddhapramukhaṁ bhikṣusaṁghaṁ bhojayitvā yadannapānamavaśiṣṭam tadviṇijāṁ dattam |
divy21:244: kiṁ kalpate tanmama grahītumāhosvinna kalpata iti? bhagavānāha—yadi prasannāḥ prasannādhikāraṁ kurvanti, gṛhāṇa |
divy21:245: bhagavan, mā deveṣu notpapatsye? bhagavānāha—vatsa, puṣpametat, phalamanyadbhaviṣyati |
divy21:246: tena bhagavadvacanābhisampratyayāt parituṣṭena gatvā ratnāni gṛhītāni |
divy21:249: tato rājagṛhanivāsinaḥ paurāḥ saṁnipatya saṁjalpaṁ kurvanti—bhavantaḥ, śreṣṭhī kālagataḥ |
divy21:250: kaṁ śreṣṭhinamabhiṣañcāma iti? tatraike kathayanti—yaḥ puṇyamaheśākhya iti |
divy21:251: apare kathayanti—kathamasmābhirjñātavyamiti? te kathayanti—nānāvarṇāni bījāni pakkakumbhe prakṣipāmaḥ, ya ekavarṇānyuddhariṣyati, taṁ śreṣṭhinamabhiṣiñcāma iti |
divy21:253: ārocitaṁ ca—bhavantaḥ, ya ekavarṇāni bījāni etasmāt kumbhāduddharet, sa śreṣṭhyabhiṣicyate |
divy21:254: yasya vaḥ śreṣṭhitvamabhipretaṁ ca, uddharatu iti |
divy21:257: tena tu gṛhapatiputreṇaikavarṇānyuddhṛtāni\ paurajānapadāḥ kathayanti—bhavantaḥ, ayaṁ puṇyamaheśākhyaḥ |
divy21:260: kathamenaṁ śreṣṭhinamabhiṣiñcāma iti? apare kathayanti—punarapi tāvat jijñāsāmaḥ |
divy21:265: sa gṛhapatiḥ saṁlakṣayati—yadapyanena mama bhṛtikayā karma kṛtam, tathāpyayaṁ puṇyamaheśākhyaḥ sattvaḥ |
divy21:267: tena tasya sarvālaṁkāravibhūṣitā duhitā bhāryārthaṁ dattā |
divy21:269: sahasaivaṁ bhogairabhyudgata iti tasya sahasodgato gṛhapatiḥ sahasodgato gṛhapatiriti saṁjñā saṁvṛttā |
divy21:271: sa saṁlakṣayati—yā kācidasmākaṁ śrīsaubhāgyasampat, sarvāsau buddhaṁ bhagavantamāgamya |
divy21:272: yannvahaṁ punarapi buddhapramukhaṁ bhikṣusaṁghamantargṛhe upanimantrya bhojayeyam |
divy21:274: upasaṁkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ |
divy21:275: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṁ sahasodgataṁ gṛhapatiṁ bhagavān dharmyayā kathayā saṁdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṁpraharṣayati |
divy21:276: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṁdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṁpraharṣya tūṣṇīm |
divy21:277: atha sahasodgato gṛhapatirutthāyāsanādekāṁsamuttarāsaṅgaṁ kṛtvā yena bhagavāṁstenāñjaliṁ praṇamya bhagavantamidamavocat—adhivāsayatu bhagavāñ śvo ’ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṁ bhikṣusaṁgheneti |
divy21:279: atha sahasodgato gṛhapatirbhagavatastūṣṇībhāvenādhivāsanāṁ viditvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato ’ntikāt prakrāntaḥ |
divy21:280: atha sahasodgato gṛhapatistāmeva rātriṁ śuciṁ praṇītaṁ khādanīyaṁ bhojanīyaṁ samudānīya kālyamevotthāya āsanāni prajñapyodakamaṇīn pratiṣṭhāpya bhagavato dūtena kālamārocayati—samayo bhadanta, sajjaṁ bhaktam yasyedānīṁ bhagavān kālaṁ manyata iti |
divy21:281: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaramādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto yena sahasodgatasya gṛhapater niveśanaṁ tenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy21:283: atha sahasodgato gṛhapatiḥ sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṁ buddhapramukhaṁ bhikṣusaṁghaṁ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastaṁ saṁtarpayati saṁpravārayati |
divy21:284: anekaparyāyeṇa śucinā praṇītena khādanīyena bhojanīyena svahastaṁ saṁtarpya saṁpravārya bhagavantaṁ bhuktavantaṁ viditvā dhautahastamapanītapātraṁ nīcataramāsanaṁ gṛhītvā bhagavataḥ purastāt niṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya |
divy21:285: tasya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṁ dhātuṁ prakṛtiṁ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāyasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yāṁ śrutvā sahasodgatena gṛhapatinā viṁśatiśikharasamudgataṁ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṁ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāpattiphalaṁ sākṣātkṛtam |
divy21:286: sa dṛṣṭasatyastrirudānamudānayati—idamasmākaṁ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṁ na pitrā neṣṭena na svajanabandhuvargeṇa na rājñā na devatābhir na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇairyadbhagavatā asmākaṁ kṛtam |
divy21:287: ucchoṣitā rudhirāśrasamudrāḥ, laṅghitā asthiparvatāḥ, pihitānyapāyadvārāṇi, vivṛtāni svargamokṣadvārāṇi, pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ, smo devamanuṣyeṣu |
divy21:289: eṣo ’haṁ buddhaṁ bhagavantaṁ śaraṇaṁ gacchāmi dharmaṁ ca bhikṣusaṁghaṁ ca |
divy21:290: upāsakaṁ ca māṁ dhāraya adyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṁ prāṇopetamabhiprasannamiti |
divy21:291: atha bhagavān sahasodgataṁ gṛhapatiṁ dharmyayā kathayā saṁdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṁpraharṣyotthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ |
divy21:293: bhikṣavaḥ saṁśayajātāaḥ sarvasaṁśayacchettāraṁ buddhaṁ bhagavantaṁ papracchuh—kiṁ bhadanta sahasodgatena gṛhapatinā karma kṛtam yena bhṛtikayā karma kṛtam, yena sahasā bhogairabhivṛddhaḥ, satyadarśanaṁ ca kṛtamiti? bhagavānāha—sahasodgatenaiva bhikṣavo gṛhapatinā karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāni oghavatpratyupasthitānyavaśyabhāvīni |
divy21:295: ko ’nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati? na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipaṣyante, nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, api tu upātteṣveva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni vipacyante śubhānyaśubhāni ca |
divy21:297: sāmagrīṁ prāpya kālaṁ ca phalanti khalu dehinām (3)|
divy21:298: bhūtapūrvaṁ bhikṣavo ’nyatarasmin karvaṭake gṛhapatiḥ prativasati āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī |
divy21:300: sa tayā sārdhaṁ krīḍati ramate paricārayati |
divy21:301: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasattvā saṁvṛttā |
divy21:302: sā aṣṭānāṁ vā navānāṁ vā māsānāmatyayāt prasūtā |
divy21:304: tasya trīṇi saptakānyekaviṁśatidivasāni vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṁ kṛtvā kulasadṛśaṁ nāmadheyaṁ vyavasthāpitam |
divy21:306: yāvadapareṇa samayena sa gṛhapatiḥ saṁprāpte vasantakālasamaye saṁpuṣpiteṣu pādapeṣu haṁsakrauñcamayūraśukaśārikākokilajīvaṁjīvakonnāditam vanakhaṇḍamantarjanasahāya udyānabhūmiṁ nirgataḥ |
divy21:307: asati buddhānāmutpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasyā |
divy21:311: adrākṣīt sa gṛhapatistaṁ pratyekabuddhaṁ kāyaprāsādikaṁ ca śānteneryāpathenodyānaṁ praviśantam |
divy21:316: sa gṛhapatiḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati—ārya, kiṁ nivartase tvam? piṇḍakenārthī |
divy21:321: so ’pi tasya piṇḍakena yogodvahanaṁ kartuṁ pravṛttaḥ |
divy21:322: yāvadapareṇa samayena tasya gṛhapateranyatarakarvaṭake kiṁcit karaṇīyamutpannam |
divy21:323: sa patnīmāmantrayate—bhadre, mamāmuṣmin karvaṭake kiṁcit karaṇīyamutpannam |
divy21:327: aparasmin divase sā gṛhapatnī kālyamevotthāya tadarthamannapānaṁ sādhayitumārabdhā |
divy21:328: sā putreṇocyate—amba, kasyārthe ’nnapānaṁ sādhyata iti? sā kathayati—putra, yo ’sau udyāne śāntātma pravrajitastiṣṭhati, tasyārthe sādhyata iti |
divy21:329: sa ruṣitaḥ kathayati—amba, kimarthaṁ bhṛtikayā karma kṛtvā na bhuṅkta iti? sā kathayati—putra, mā evaṁ vocaḥ |
divy21:333: patnīmāmantrayate—bhadre, kṛtaste tasya piṇḍakenāvighātah? āryaputra kṛtaḥ |
divy21:334: kiṁ tu anena dārakeṇa tasyāntike kharāvāgniścāritā |
divy21:335: sa kathayati—bhadre, kiṁ kathayati? tayā vistareṇa samākhyātam |
divy21:337: gacchāmi, taṁ mahātmānaṁ kṣamāpayāmi—mā atyantameva kṣato bhaviṣyati |
divy21:338: iti viditvā taṁ dārakamādāya yena pratyekabuddhastenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy21:341: tat kimatra kāraṇamiti? asamanvāhṛtya śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṁ jñānadarśanaṁ na pravartate |
divy21:344: kāyikī teṣāṁ mahātmanāṁ dharmadeśanā na vācikī |
divy21:345: sa tasyānukampārthaṁ vitatapakṣa hava haṁsarāja uparivihāyasamabhyudgamya jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kartumārabdhaḥ |
divy21:347: sa mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ saputraḥ pādayor nipatitaḥ |
divy21:348: tataḥ sa dāraka āhṛṣṭaromakūpaḥ kathayati—avatara avatara sadbhūtadakṣiṇīya, mama kāmapaṅkanimagnasya hastoddhāramanuprayaccheti |
divy21:350: sa gṛhapatiputrastīvreṇāśayena pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṁ kartumārabdhah—yanmayā evaṁvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kharā vāgniścāritā, mā tasya karmaṇo bhāgī syām |
divy21:351: yattu idānīṁ cittamabhiprasāditam, anenāhaṁ kuśalamūlenāḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jāyeyam, evaṁvidhānāṁ ca dharmāṇāṁ lābhī syām, prativiśiṣṭataraṁ cātaḥ śāstāramārāgayeyaṁ mā virāgayeyamiti |
divy21:353: kiṁ manyadhve bhikṣavah? yo ’sau gṛhapatiputraḥ, eṣa evāsau sahasodgato gṛhapatiḥ |
divy21:354: yadanena pratyekabuddhasyāntike kharā vāgniścāritā, tena pañca janmaśatāni bhṛtakapuruṣo jātaḥ |
divy21:356: yat punastasyaivāntike cittamabhiprasādya praṇidhānaṁ kṛtam, tena sahasaiva bhogairabhivṛddhaḥ |
divy21:358: ahaṁ cānena pratyekabuddhakoṭiśatasahasrebhyaḥ prativiśiṣṭataraḥ śāstā ārāgito na virāgitaḥ |
divy21:359: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṁ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ, ekāntaśuklānāmekāntaśuklaḥ, vyatimiśrāṇāṁ vyatimiśraḥ |
divy21:360: tasmāttarhi ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇyapāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca, ekāntaśukleṣveva karmasvābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
divy21:363: (iyaṁ tāvadutpattir na tāvat buddho bhagavāñ śrāvakāṇāṁ vinaye śikṣāpadam |
